text: Wade Andrew Williams (born December 24, 1961) is an American movie, television, and voice actor who is best known for his role as Brad Bellick in Prison Break. Williams was born on December 24, 1961 in Tulsa, Oklahoma. He studied at Rutgers University and at the University of Tulsa. ==Other websites== * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American video game actors Category:Actors from Tulsa, Oklahoma Category:Rutgers University alumni
title: Wade Williams
